tree.name: Kentavious Caldwell-Pope
tree.tradeDescription: Memphis traded Desmond Bane and a 2026 1st round pick swap to Orlando for KCP, Cole Anthony, 2025 1st (16th pick, Yang Hansen), 2028 1st (ORL), 2029 1st pick swap, and 2030 1st (ORL)
tree.note: Georgia guard, acquired from Orlando in Desmond Bane trade

assetsGivenUp.name: Desmond Bane
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: 3-team trade: MEM sent 2023 2nd (Keyonte Johnson) and 2025 2nd (Kobe Sanders) to BOS, cash to POR; BOS sent Bane (#30 pick) to MEM and Enes Kanter to POR; POR sent Mario Hezonja to MEM
assetsGivenUp.note: TCU guard, drafted 30th overall by Boston Celtics; traded to MEM on draft night. BOS had pick #30 as their own (2020 ECF team).

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 MEM 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to Boston in Bane 3-team trade; originally from MIA via DAL, ended up as MIA's pick

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 MEM 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Memphis' own 2025 2nd round pick; sent to Boston, who traded it to NYK, then to LAC; #50 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: Cash Considerations
assetsGivenUp.note: Cash sent to Portland in 3-team trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 1st Round Pick Swap Rights
assetsGivenUp.note: Memphis' own 2026 first-round pick swap rights, sent to Orlando
